   • Liestyle actors: Poor sleep habits, decreased physical activity, and

    unhealthy eating patterns are common among individuals with BD,

    contributing to weight changes (5).

Treatment Options

While there is no specifc treatment or weight-related issues in bipolar

disorder, several strategies can help manage weight:

   • Medication adjustments: Switching rom antipsychotics to mood

    stabilizers or adjusting medication dosages may help mitigate weight

    gain (6).
